name: Santy Sanity
description:
Santy Sanity is a short PS1 Style Game, made in 2 weeks for the 32bit Holiday Game Jam.

A Powercut occured in the Santy Inc. Factory and you need to fix the electricity.

Controls:

-WASD to move

-D to move the slider

-Space to jump

- E to interact

-B to go back

-Enter to accept

 -F to maximize the window
